Function Documentation

int dbin ( int  x)

This function converts x to a string (binary) and outputs the string using the write function.

int dfloat ( float  x)

This function converts x to a string (floating point) and outputs the string using the write function.

int dhex ( int  x)

This function converts x to a string (hex lowercase) and outputs the string using the write function.

int dHex ( int  x)

This function converts x to a string (hex uppercase) and outputs the string using the write function.

int dint ( int  x)

This function converts x to a string (signed integer) and outputs the string using the write function.

void dsetmode ( int  leading_zeros)

This function sets the mode.

void dsetwritefunc ( int(*)(const void *, int)  func)

This function sets the callback to write data to the debug output.

int dstr ( char *  str)

This function outputs a string using the write function.

int duint ( unsigned int  x)

This function converts x to a string (unsigned integer) and outputs the string using the write function.
